maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/115/sett.orig: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/115/sett.text: Un des arbres malades. Appliquez le \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] pour le guérir.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/497/sett.orig: Hello. I am the canonical NPC.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/497/sett.text: Bonjour. Je suis le PNJ bateau.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/569/sett.orig:
\i[arrow-w] To Bergen Trail
\i[arrow-ne] To Rookie Harbor
\i[arrow-s] Old Path

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Jeff
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Jeff

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Sorry, I'm kinda in the middle of something here...
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Désolé, je suis un peu en plein milieu de quelque chose là...

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Oh wait. You're that girl\..\..\.. Lea, right?
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Oh, attends. Tu es cette fille-là\..\..\.. Lea, c'est ça ?

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Jean already told me you'd come.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Jean m'a déjà dit que tu viendrais.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Sorry to get you involved. I can't understand why she's not using the Direct Link.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Ça me désole un peu que tu joues le rôle d'intermédiaire. Je ne comprends pas pourquoi elle n'utilise pas simplement les Directs Links.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Yeah, anyway.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Oui bon, peu importe.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: This is about the bunny or whatever she saw right?
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: C'est à propos de ce lapin ou de je ne sais pas quoi qu'elle a vu, c'est ça ?

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: I do remember that you can summon some sort of \c[3]Legendary Bunny\c[0] by collecting 5 \c[3]\v[item.139.name]s\c[0] somewhere in \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0].
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Je me souviens que l'on peut invoquer le \c[3]Lapin Légendaire\c[0] en récoltant 5 \c[3]Carottes Congelées\c[0] quelque part sur le \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: But there was another requirement. I can't remember what it was. Maybe our Hexacast-friend Jock knows more about it.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Mais il y a un autre prérequis. Je me souviens plus de ce que c'était. Peut-être que notre ami Hexacast Jock en sait plus.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Jeff
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Jeff

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Yep, that's all. Also, I'm \c[3]Jeff\c[0], nice to meet you.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Oui, c'est tout. Sinon, je suis \c[3]Jeff\c[0]. Ravi de te connaitre.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Hi Lea, Hi!
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Salut ! Lea ! Salut !

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Ah, there's the problem with the speech module Jean told me about.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Ah oui, Jean m'a déjà parlé du problème avec ton module vocal.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Nah, don't sweat it. I'll just DL Jean everything I told you.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: C'est bon, ne stresse pas. Je vais juste D-Linker Jean avec tout ce que je t'ai dit.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: She should learn how to use the Direct Link System anyhow.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Faudrait bien qu'elle apprenne à utiliser le Système de Direct Link de toute façon.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Jeff
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Jeff

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Hi Lea.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Salut, Lea.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.orig: I DL'd Jean everything, so you don't have to tell her.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/606/sett.text: J'ai déjà tout D-Linké à Jean, donc tu n'as pas besoin de lui raconter.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/616/sett.orig: We're clearly missing some key item here.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/616/sett.text: Il nous manque clairement un genre d'item clef là.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/616/sett.orig: They do that to promote backtracking to previous areas.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/616/sett.text: Ils font ça pour forcer les gens à revenir dans les régions précédentes.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/616/sett.orig: I bet the content is totally worth it.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/616/sett.text: Je parie que le contenu doit être bien.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/617/sett.orig: An obelisk that is used as waymarker
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/617/sett.text: Un obélisque, qui sert de point de repère.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.orig: There you are! Thanks for dropping by.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.text: Ah te voilà ! Merci d'être venu.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.orig: There you are! Thanks for dropping by.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.text: Ah vous voilà ! Merci d'être venu.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.orig: Let's just go straight to the headquarters.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.text: Allons directement vers le quartier général.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.orig: It's to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]. Just follow me!
So how big is your guild, anyway?
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.text: D'ailleurs, elle est grande comment, votre guilde ?

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.orig: Not big. You're about to see it yourself.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.text: Pas grande. Tu le verras bientôt par toi-même.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.orig: Follow \c[3]Schneider\c[0] to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] near \c[3]Autumn's Rise - Pathway 3\c[0].
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/628/sett.text: Suivez \c[3]Schneider\c[0] vers le \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] près du \c[3]Chemin 3 à \v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.orig: Those damn Bovines barely take any damage from my attacks!
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.text: Ces satanés bovins ne prennent quasiment jamais de dégâts de mes attaques !

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.orig: I told you, throwing balls won't impress them much. You gotta get close and personal!
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.text: Je te l'ai déjà dit, lancer des boules ne va pas les impressionner. Faut que tu cognes !

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.orig: Do I look like some kind of brawler to you?
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.text: Est-ce que j'ai l'air d'être un bagarreur pour toi ?

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.orig: I don't think the Bovines care. All they understand is literal ass-kicking!
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.text: Les bovins doivent s'en foutre. Tout ce qu'ils comprennent, c'est littéralement des coups de pieds au cul !
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.note: de: les bovins doivent s'en gratter.

maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.orig: Then I guess I will need to get used to it.
maps/autumn/path4.json/entities/637/sett.text: Alors il va falloir que je m'habitue.
